name: Skiploom
flavorText:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

previous.name: Hoppip
previous.flavorText:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

next.name: Jumpluff
next.flavorText:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.
